name: MyToothbrush
0:
”Alexa, start my toothbrush”
”Alexa, tell my toothbrush to brush my teeth now”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my toothbrush
des:
Dentists recommend you spend at least two minutes brushing your teeth, but the average adult spends around half that much time. This app guides you through a timed session focusing on all the different areas of your mouth, so you don't miss any spots.

Interesting facts about teeth are sprinkled throughout, so you learn while you clean!

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
